name: Persistence Via New AMSI Providers
description: Detects when an attacker registers a new AMSI provider in order to achieve persistence
false_positives: Legitimate security products adding their own AMSI providers
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((winlog.event_data.EventType:CreateKey AND registry.path:(*\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\AMSI\\Providers\\* OR *\\SOFTWARE\\WOW6432Node\\Microsoft\\AMSI\\Providers\\*)) AND (NOT (process.executable:C\:\\Program\ Files*)))`
